ComicInfo.Title: The Final Bong
ComicInfo.Summary:
The final battle between Howard the Duck and Dr. Bong has begun. Chaos ensues through a hospital and finally ends up at Dr. Bong’s castle. Will Beverly be the shining light to save everyone from this heated battle!?
Note: This was the last issue of Howard the Duck for some years. After this issue, the comic was reverted into a magazine form some months later as Howard the Duck (magazine).
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-14 21:13:25. [CVDB19532]
ComicInfo.Characters: Beverly Switzler, Doctor Bong, Howard the Duck, Lee Switzler, Paul Same, Winda Wester
